mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(IMP_UID , '' ) AS IMP_UID , IFNULL(IMP_MSG , '' ) AS IMP_MSG , IFNULL(USER_NAME , '' ) AS USER_NAME , IFNULL(USER_CONTACT1 , '' ) AS USER_CONTACT1 , IFNULL(USER_CI , '' ) AS USER_CI , IFNULL(IMP_ETC , '' ) AS IMP_ETC , IFNULL(REG_DT , '' ) AS REG_DT FROM DC_IMP_LOG
IMP_UID = #{impUid}
